bibl.title: Sculpture and Society. A Study of the Connection between the Free-standing Sculpture and Society on Kos in the Hellenistic and Augustan Periods.
bibl.note: Pp. 88-93: Appendix 1. The Koan incorporation of Kalymnos and statues honouring Arsinoe III and Ptolemaios.
bibl.seg: HÖGHAMMAR Kerstin, Sculpture and Society. A Study of the Connection between the Free-standing Sculpture and Society on Kos in the Hellenistic and Augustan Periods. (Acta Universitatis Upsaliensis. Boreas. 23.)
Uppsala, Almqvist & Wiksell International, 1993, 8°, 227 pp., 2 plans, 12 pll. ISBN 91-554-3136-4.
Pp. 88-93: Appendix 1. The Koan incorporation of Kalymnos and statues honouring Arsinoe III and Ptolemaios.
